import { useState } from "react"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux" export default function UserForm(){ const [showform ,setshowform]=useState(false) const dispatch = useDispatch() const ResetUser = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Ajoutez les parenthèses pour appeler la méthode alert('Restusers') dispatch(updateUser) }; const UpdateUser =(e)=>{ e.preventDefault() setshowform(true) dispatch() } const submitUser =(e)=>{ e.preventDefault() setshowform(false) } return( <>
{showform && ( <>
)} ) }
